title: Add Terms of Service and Privacy Policy pages
scope: Create Terms of Service and Privacy Policy content in docs
Link legal pages from the site footer
acceptance_criteria: Terms of Service is available at /terms in the frontend
Privacy Policy is available at /privacy in the frontend
docs/terms-of-service.md and docs/privacy-policy.md exist with matching content
Footer links include Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
risk_notes: Legal content may need follow-up edits once mailing address or policies are finalized
rollback_plan: Revert the new legal page components and footer links
Remove the docs pages if needed
